item.title: R vs Python
item.description: The code below shows how R and Python can work together! #Here is a code written in R: library(reticulate) data <- c(1:5) #Here is a code written in Python: print(r.data) ## [1, 2, 3, 4, 5] The code below shows the use of regular expressions in Python to match all IP addresses in a real-world string! import re string2="Jan 13 00:48:59: DROP service 68->67(udp) from 213.92.153.167 to 69.43.107.219, prefix: \"spoof iana-0/8\" \ (in: eth0 69.
